thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Leclanché, Enel and Enertrag To Build Storage Plant In Germany

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Leclanché, Enel and Enertrag To Build Storage Plant In Germany

organizations.name: enertrag to build storage plant in germany feb

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - LECLANCHE SA:
* EQS-ADHOC: LECLANCHÉ SA:ENEL, ENERTRAG AND LECLANCHÉ TEAM UP TO BUILD STORAGE PLANT IN GERMANY
* INVESTMENT PLANNED FOR CONSTRUCTION OF NEW PLANT IS APPROX. 17 MILLION EUROS
* FIRST 2 MW SECTION OF FACILITY IS EXPECTED TO BE OPERATIONAL IN APRIL 2018
* ENTIRE PLANT PLANNED TO COME ONLINE BY END OF YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
